snippet: The comments from Mr. Trump follow months of vows to build a wall on the U.S.-Mexico border and deport immigrants who have entered the country illegally....
abstract: Donald J Trump modifies his hard-line stance on immigration, saying he wants 'really fair, but firm' approach to millions of illegal immigrants in country; he had previously called for wall on Mexican border and mass deportations.

byline.original: By ALAN RAPPEPORT and MAGGIE HABERMAN
byline.contributor: Thomas Kaplan and Nick Corasaniti contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The comments from Mr. Trump follow months of vows to build a wall on the U.S.-Mexico border and deport immigrants who have entered the country illegally.

headline.main: Donald Trump, Shifting Immigration Tone, Stresses a ‘Fair’ Approach
headline.print_headline: Trump, Shifting Tone on Immigration, Stresses a ‘Fair, but Firm’ Approach
